data.name: LEGO® DC TV Series Super-Villains Character Pack
data.detailed_description:
Download now to get access to the DC TV Super-Villains Character Pack! Expand your character roster with the DC TV Super-Villains Character Pack. Play as your favorite Super-Villains from DC's exciting TV Series. This character pack includes:
• Vandal Savage
• Vigilante
• Zoom
• Reign
• Indigo
• Prometheus
data.about_the_game:
Download now to get access to the DC TV Super-Villains Character Pack! Expand your character roster with the DC TV Super-Villains Character Pack. Play as your favorite Super-Villains from DC's exciting TV Series. This character pack includes:
• Vandal Savage
• Vigilante
• Zoom
• Reign
• Indigo
• Prometheus
data.short_description: Download now to get access to the DC TV Super-Villains Character Pack!
data.supported_languages:
English*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic, Danish, Dutch, Japanese*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3240 (2 * 3400) or equivalent, AMD Athlon X4 740 (2 * 3200) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 (1024 MB), Intel Iris Pro 5200 (shared), Radeon HD 5850 (1024 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4570T (2*2900) or equivalent, AMD FX-6350 (6 * 3900) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 Ti (2048 MB), Radeon HD 7970 (3072 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
